publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1215 Mary Scanlon: Long Term Care-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to implement the key recommendations of the report With Respect to Old Age: Long Term Care - Rights and Responsibilities of the Royal Commission chaired by Sir Stewart Sutherland, including the funding of personal care on the basis of assessed need in order to alleviate the problems facing those who require long term care. Supported by: Ben Wallace*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Murray Tosh*, David Mundell*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Keith Harding*, Bill Aitken*
S1M-1215 Long Term Care (lodged on 26 September 2000) David McLetchie*
